arrow.description: If `true`, adds an arrow to the tooltip.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

disableFocusListener.description: Do not respond to focus events.

disableHoverListener.description: Do not respond to hover events.

disableTouchListener.description: Do not respond to long press touch events.

enterDelay.description:
The number of milliseconds to wait before showing the tooltip.
This prop won't impact the enter touch delay (`enterTouchDelay`).

enterNextDelay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait before showing the tooltip when one was already recently opened.

enterTouchDelay.description: The number of milliseconds a user must touch the element before showing the tooltip.

id.description:
This prop is used to help implement the accessibility logic.
If you don't provide this prop. It falls back to a randomly generated id.

interactive.description:
Makes a tooltip interactive, i.e. will not close when the user
hovers over the tooltip before the `leaveDelay` is expired.

leaveDelay.description:
The number of milliseconds to wait before hiding the tooltip.
This prop won't impact the leave touch delay (`leaveTouchDelay`).

leaveTouchDelay.description: The number of milliseconds after the user stops touching an element before hiding the tooltip.

onClose.description: Callback fired when the component requests to be closed.

tags.title: param
tags.description: The event source of the callback.
tags.name: event

onOpen.description: Callback fired when the component requests to be open.

tags.title: param
tags.description: The event source of the callback.
tags.name: event

title.description: Tooltip title. Zero-length titles string are never displayed.

TransitionComponent.description:
The component used for the transition.
[Follow this guide](/components/transitions/#transitioncomponent-prop) to learn more about the requirements for this component.

descriptions.popper: Styles applied to the Popper component.
descriptions.popperInteractive: Styles applied to the Popper component if `interactive={true}`.
descriptions.popperArrow: Styles applied to the Popper component if `arrow={true}`.
descriptions.tooltip: Styles applied to the tooltip (label wrapper) element.
descriptions.tooltipArrow: Styles applied to the tooltip (label wrapper) element if `arrow={true}`.
descriptions.arrow: Styles applied to the arrow element.
descriptions.touch: Styles applied to the tooltip (label wrapper) element if the tooltip is opened by touch.
descriptions.tooltipPlacementLeft: Styles applied to the tooltip (label wrapper) element if `placement` contains "left".
descriptions.tooltipPlacementRight: Styles applied to the tooltip (label wrapper) element if `placement` contains "right".
descriptions.tooltipPlacementTop: Styles applied to the tooltip (label wrapper) element if `placement` contains "top".
descriptions.tooltipPlacementBottom: Styles applied to the tooltip (label wrapper) element if `placement` contains "bottom".
